headline: UPS vs. WAB: Which Dividend-Paying Transportation Stock Has an Edge?
summary: WAB outpaces UPS with stronger stock gains, a healthier dividend profile, and a more robust growth outlook.

raw.headline: UPS vs. WAB: Which Dividend-Paying Transportation Stock Has an Edge?

headline: Wabtec Secures $386 Million Order from New York’s MTA for New Locomotives
summary: PITTSBURGH, January 07, 2026--Wabtec Corporation (NYSE: WAB) secured a $386 million follow-on order to deliver additional R255 hybrid battery-diesel work locomotives to New York’s Metropolitan Transportation Authority (MTA). The order is a major step in the Authority’s Capital Plan to revitalize the city’s transit network infrastructure and improve the capabilities and safety of its maintenance crews.
